body: The value is great! especially when you catch it on sale. Incredibly sheer and light weight

title: Best facial sunscreen for 45+
body: I love this sunscreen! The packaging is pretty and it fits in your hands nicely. The sunscreen itself had a little tint to it and smells great. It didn't feel like I was wearing sunscreen, it was light and very thin. I wore this with and without makeup and it worked great.

title: Fantastic for sensitive skin
body: Scuba diving so looking for something that would not irritate already stressed skin at the end of the day (not sure if reef safe so did not use before dives or between). Light, worked and did not irritate my skin which is a huge plus+

title: My favorite sunscreen at the best price
body: I bought this sunscreen because one of my favorite YouTubers, Nyma Tang, uses and promotes it. It has a strong smell when first applied but it‚Äôs a good smell in my opinion. It‚Äôs pretty lightweight and gives my skin an extra glow‚ú®. I have been using it as an everyday sunscreen and I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs pretty sheer and my favorite parts is that it does not leave a cast! So it‚Äôs brown and black girl friendly. Sephora sells the exact same sunscreen bottle for $50. Amazon had it for $30. So I say stock up!

title: The Best Sunscreen
body: Sunscreens usually make my eyes burn after the second application. This sunscreen does not, as well as it smells good too. It has a luxurious smell. You have to shake the bottle enough or else the sunscreen separates, as with other sunscreens, so it is not a problem. The sunscreen dissolves into my skill very well.

title: Best sunscreen
body: This is my fave sunscreen. Goes on sheer and almost feels like a serum! It‚Äôs super moisturizing without making you feel oily. It does have a scent but I like it, so it doesn‚Äôt bother me.

title: Black Girl Magic!
body: Best Sun Screen I have ever bought! No white residue, goes on smoothly and skin looks awesome! I came across this product because Black Girl Tiktok recommended!

title: Not like the old days
body: I used the sunscreen from Shiseido on a trip many years ago and was surprised how efficient it worked, actually, I came back from vacation as white as I left (I actually wanted some color on my face‚Ä¶.) used this product now and got some sun tan ( which I loved) ‚Ä¶ concluded the actual product is not as efficient as the one I used before.

title: Healing my scar!
body: I had thyroid surgery in 2020. It left me with a terrible scar across my throat. I purchased this product because of its high SPF. As soon as I started using it, I noticed my scar was disappearing! Not only does it protect me from the sun, but it actually has helped heal my surgical scar!

title: Good for melanin skin

title: Put it on -- it's like its not there.
body: Great product. The scent is nice. The feel on your skin like not being there. Will buy again.

title: Smells and feels fantastic
body: The product doesn't feel greasy or watery; it's just right. The smell is appealing which is important because you're probably putting it on your face! Great product.

title: Very good
body: Good product

title: THE BESTTTTT
body: so smooth, so light, so so so good. i‚Äôm coming back to buy more even if i didn‚Äôt finish the first bottle.

title: Love it
body: Love everything about this product. I love the small bottle. Love the lid. I even love the soft scent. It smells kinda like an asian makeup store. I mean, it's Shiseido so no surprise to there but I could see others disliking the unusual scent. It's so nice and light, it actually made me add it as a step to my skin care routine, which I'm sure is nothing but good for me. I was never a very frequent user of sunscreen.I used to use the Sun Bum face sun screen stick but it was so hard to apply. It would pull my skin and it was sticky. This Shiseido product is quite pricey though so I might try the Sun Bum liquid face sun screen when it finishes.

title: Perfection
body: This is the most refined sunscreen I‚Äôve ever tried, has never burned my skin or eyes. I would prefer unscented but I still love it. Neutrogena makes a spf 50 serum very similar to this but at a lower price point, however it stings my eyes. I keep a travel sized shiseido in my purse and this size at home. Love this

title: So worth it
body: Better deal than department store or cosmetic store. Well packaged and quality item. I will buy from this seller again

title: My favorite sunscreen
body: Kept me protected from the sun for several hours on the beach. It dries without any greasy feelings and applies easily under makeup. Only complaint is that it's so liquidy that it goes everywhere if you're not careful, a pump would have been easier (maybe).

title: Product is one bottle. I like the product.
body: Colour is cream colour but goes on nicely. I love Shiseido products and happy with this too. I thought the purchase would be two bottles (one bonus mini one) but was one. It's ok but just a heads up in case someone was confused like I was. Smallest nice too. Good size for my backpack.

title: Great Sunscreen not Greasy or Oily

title: I love this product!
body: I applied Shiseido Ultimate last after layering with other products. I did use a sunscreen made specifically for the eye area; however, I lightly blended this sun protector in with the eye sunscreen. No burn due to not directly applying on the eyelids. This product rubbed on oily, quickly soaked in within minutes, and left my face soft. Yes, I will purchase again. Thank you ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Very effective!
body: This is the most effective sunscreen I have ever used. I discovered it when trying to find something that worked really well when I'm sweating all day at a music festival. I can put this on in the morning, sweat all day in 80s-90s ¬∞F weather and not have to reapply. Plus I actually have a UV allergy where my skin will rash up in too much direct sunlight. That is a thing of the past when I use this sunscreen. Highly recommend.

title: Sun protection without zinc oxide look & protects the reefs!
body: Best facial sun screen available. We scuba dive so are always aware of reef protection, so glad to see this product takes care of this. I use primarily on my face during a 5 to 7 day dive, and use another product on body, as I am mostly covered with a wet suit. After dive vacation my face has no color- no tanning, but my arms and shoulders and legs even with a 50-70 SPF are tan! This product works, but without the totally white zinc oxide look.

title: Great protection
body: This is lightweight, goes on sheer, and does well under my bare minerals foundation. It‚Äôs a little on the oily side so it does make me a little shiny, but it works well, smells nice, and doesn‚Äôt gunk up my skin so I can live with it.

title: Great Sunscreen for the Face
body: Goes on very nice, feels more like a moisturizer than a sunscreen. Offers great protection from the sun.

title: The only draw back is...
body: ...that it's eye irritant. I didn't buy that white bottle because I'm using it mainly for outdoor activities, swimming and hiking and stuff. And this one works perfectly for that purpose. But if you plan to apply on your face you should buy the white one.

title: Good protection, very greasy
body: Good protection, effective even during sweaty exercise. A little bit goes a long way too, but it makes you look and feel really oily. I prefer lighter sunscreens like Elta MD or Tatcha for casual use.

title: Perfect for outdoor activities on land or water
body: This product was recommended by my dermatologist. It is popular among surfers in my town because it protects very well when wet. In fact, it doesn't really kick in until it becomes wet from sweat or water. I've used it in pools, the ocean, and on long outdoor hikes. It's not a great beauty product--a little heavier than your typical face sunblock. But if you're doing outdoor sports, it's outstanding.

title: different active ingredients
body: I bought a bottle from Sephora last year and loved the way it protected my skin while feeling silky smooth.When I ran out, I decided to repurchase the sunscreen from Amazon. I noticed that while the front of the bottle was exactly the same, the active ingredients were different.I decided to give the different formulation a try. It was awful, where once I could spread the sunscreen smoothly on my face, now it was sticky and left a white film that made me look ashen.I had to return the product.

title: Love it!

I will definitely buy again.
